answers.answer: I'm constantly tired it's just your body dealing with an extra body to support.

I'm glad I'm not the only one. My house is a wreck because I lack the energy to do anything. I feel horrible and just want to sleep.  My poor 4 year old gets a lot of microwave dinners and snacks. I'm ready to have this baby and get back in to a routine.

question: I'm 30 weeks pregnant & for the past month ive been hving spells where I want to fall asleep. Before that happens ill be wide awake. I've also been tested for diabetes and got positive results. Idk what it could be. How can I find out & is this dangerous?
title: sleepy when pregnant
